type UIScrollViewCondition = delegate of UIScrollView -> bool

Docs.param: The that has just received the scroll-to-top-gesture
Docs.summary: A delegate allowing fine-grained control of the scroll-to-top gesture.
Docs.returns: If , the will scroll to the top of its content view. If , it will not.

remarks.para: This delegate is called after the application user has made a scroll-to-top gesture (tapping the status bar) but before the actual scrolling takes place.
